unnormalised: Aiyyo, weather and kheti, always a gamble! Remember that drought in Maharashtra back in 2012? Total loss! My grandfather in his village, near Nashik, says yields are so unpredictable. Even with the best seeds from IARI, Pusa, if the monsoon fails around 15/07, game over! Happened again on 26/01/2023. Fingers crossed for a good harvest this year, after that weird heatwave on 03/05/2024. Jai Kisan!
